name: Electric Vehicle Direct Currency
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

description.en:
EVDC application is the world’s first EV charging application that supports its own crypto token. EVDC app will directly connect to the charging stations and let users pay using the EVDC tokens.
One of the things we are proud of is the ability to let you charge at a station without a membership account. The algorithm we developed for this creates a guest account for you and then lets you use the particular Charging Station. This happens without the user needing to interfere. We’re trying our best to make the process as smooth as possible for our users.
